import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; class Chores extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { info: {} }; } componentDidMount() { const url = 'http://10.66.1.128:5000'; // get general info / debug info axios.get(url + '/api/tokens/info').then(res => { this.setState({ info: res.data }); console.log(this.state.info); }); } render() { let taskJose = 'Feed dog'; let taskJuan = 'Walk dog'; return (
Home
week {this.state.info.color}

Alfredo Jose

- Sweep floors
- Mop floors (mon)
- Wipe dining table
- Wipe kitchen counters

Juan Ramon

- {taskJuan}
- Tidy porch
- Sweep Porch
- Sweep porch stairs
- Pick up trash from yard

Jose Manuel

- {taskJose}
- Tidy bathroom sink counter
- Clean toilet
- Windex bathroom mirror
- Wash dishes

Jackeline Paola

- Take out kitchen trash
- Take out bathroom trash
- Tidy living room
- Set bin to the front (mon/thu)
); } } export default Chores;
